tweet.tweet_content: First half stats from the VAL-FCB friendly:
Halftime in Oslo! Valerenga 0-4 FC Barcelona.
Min 42: GOAL! Dos Santos fires to the back of the net after an assist from Alexis. VAL 0 - 4 FCB
Min 30: Messi nearly scores but Hirschfeld saves the attempt!
Great run from Sergi Roberto who finds Messi at the top of the box. The Argentinian's shot rockets off the woodwork!
GOAL! Leo Messi makes it three. The Argentinian beats three defenders and then fires past the keeper. Great goal for the forward.
GOAL! Tello scores to make it two after another great assist from Leo Messi!
GOAL! Alexis, after a great assist from Messi, fires Barça ahead.
We're off! The first half is underway!

Full match stats from the Bayern - Barça friendly:
Final at the Allianz Arena. Goals from Lahm and Mandzukic give Bayern a 2-0 victory over Barça.
Min 86: Mandzukic doubles Bayern's lead after he scoops up a cross from the left wing. 2-0.
Min 62: Fantastic save from Oier! Corner for Bayern.
Min 56: Good save from Oier to deny Ribéry.
Oier, Kiko, Planas, Sergi G., Patric, Ilie, Espinosa, Quintillà, Nieto, Joan Román & Dongou have been subbed into the match in the 2nd half.
The second half is underway!
First half stats from the Bayern-Barça friendly:
Halftime at the Allianz Arena! Bayern 1 - 0 Barça.
Min 44: Rafinha's back pass hits the post! Corner for Barça.
Min 43: Bartra is booked for a foul on Ribéry.
Min 41: Mascherano is booked for a foul on Ribéry.
Min 38: Tello! Great play from the forward, but his shot goes wide of goal.
Min 30: Müller's shot is cleared off the line by Adriano. Corner for Bayern.
Min 30: Bayern 1 - 0 Barça.
Min 18: Sergi Roberto's shot goes just wide of Neuer's goal!
Goal. Lahm scores the first goal of the night after a cross from Ribéry. 1-0.
Min 4: Adriano clears the ball off the line! Corner for Bayern.
Min 3: Bayern get a chance on goal, but Pinto saves the attempt.
Min 1: Messi nearly fires Barça ahead, but his shot goes just wide.
The match between Bayern and FC Barcelona is underway!
The two teams come out onto the pitch of the Allianz Arena.

. : "Messi is the best player in the world, he has been for a while now. I'm really looking forward to playing with him"
. : "Dani Alves is partly responsible for this move because he spoke very highly of Barça."
. : "I think adjusting to European football could be difficult, but I hope to adjust quickly."
. : "I've never been bothered with what number is on my shirt. I've never had a preference for a specific number."
. : "Money is ok, but happiness takes priority. We decided to come to Barcelona."
. : "I had a lot of offers, but I followed my heart."

FCB - Màlaga
Min 70: Sub for Málaga: Sebas come in for Joaquín.
Remember, after the match against Málaga, you can follow Barça's tribute to Abidal on .

FC Barcelona train at the Parc des Princes

Jordi Roura: “It will be an extremely difficult match”
FC Barcelona's training session at the Parc des Princes
. : “We can't make the same mistake we did against Milan, fighting back is difficult"
Jordi Roura's press conference has ended. Details on what was said by the manager will be posted shortly on
Roura: "PSG have tall, physical players who are very good on set pieces. However, we won't change our way of defending."
Roura: "Our style of play won't change even with Ibrahimovic on the pitch. We know he's a fantastic player."
Roura: "The match against Milan showed us that we cannot let our guard down. We have to be at 100%."
Roura: "Tito will be on the bench tomorrow. His return brings us all great joy, he's very loved."
Roura: "Alba and Xavi are recovering well, but we have to see how they're feeling after today's training session."
Roura: "Tomorrow's match will be extremely difficult. We must be intense and focused."
Roura: "Tello has unique qualities that he brings to the team. But the final decision on the starting team will be made with Tito"
Roura: "We are very eager to play this match. We're in the quarter finals, the level of play is very demanding."
Now it's Jordi Roura's turn to talk to the press.
Villa: "Messi is our marquee player and I will work hard to help him and the team."
Villa: "Tomorrow's game is going to be fantastic, two historic teams will face off. It will be a hard-fought tie."
Villa: "Ibrahimovic is in a whole different class. If he's on his game, it will be difficult to stop him."
Villa: "It would be disrespectful to talk about my future on the eve of one of the biggest matches of the season."
Villa:"All of the work I put in behind closed doors-when I wasn't getting much playing time-is paying off. I want to help the team"
Villa: "Abidal is an example to us all. Seeing his joy after what he's gone through is an example of what can be achieved through hard work"
Villa: "We know that scoring an away goal is very important. If we can get an advantage ahead of the return leg, even better."
Villa: "It's difficult to pick a favourite in the UCL. The teams that made it this far deserve to be here, and any of them can eliminate us"
Villa: "It's a great joy to have Tito back. He's our boss and when he's with us everything is easier."
Villa: "I feel great physically despite the small injuries. I have confidence. I'm happy and content."
Villa: "We can't make the same mistake we made against Milan, because fighting back is difficult. We need to have two good games."
